pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Folklife Center, Library of Congress
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of sound recordings, film footage, photographs and accompanying manuscript documentation on two widely publicized expeditions to Oceania and Indonesia in 1940 and 1941 that documented music and dance in the South Sea islands. Includes a copy of the NBC Blue Network program broadcast live from Suva, Fiji by the Fahnestock expedition on August 19, 1940.
